title: Drink-driving education
creator_credit: Greg Reading, Jan Sharp, Tom Chen, Peter Johnson, Peter Skolinick and New South Wales. Dept. of Education
brief_description: A compilation of “Drinking, driving, surviving”, “Saturday night again” and “The Thirsty season”. Covers physiological effects of alcohol; the social context and advertising.
